room_title: Escape room "Disorderly Conduct" by Epic Escape Rooms LI in New York
review: The best escape room! I would say better than some NYC escape the rooms. The staff is amazing amazing, so nice and friendly and really root for you to exit the room. We did the Disorderly Conduct, which was hard, but we had a blast. Highly recommend and looking forward to returning and going to the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Disorderly Conduct" by Epic Escape Rooms LI in New York
review: Went with a group of friends and had a blast, staff was so fun and accommodating. Did Disorderly Conduct which was more challenging than I expected but it was a lot of fun and left us with a lot of head-scratching moments. Wasn't scary so good for all ages and for the faint of heart. We got out just in time with 2 minutes to spare. The experience was super affordable which is a huge bonus. Coming back for my birthday in a couple of weeks to try killer!

room_title: Escape room "Disorderly Conduct" by Epic Escape Rooms LI in New York
review: Had a blast at the “Disorderly Conduct” room which I highly recommend. It was challenging and fun at the same time. Super affordable! The staff is very friendly, with great personalities! I can’t wait to book my next one!

room_title: Escape room "Disorderly Conduct" by Epic Escape Rooms LI in New York
review: Had a great time doing the Disorderly Conduct! They were super friendly and when it got challenging they gave great helpful clues! I've been to a few rooms and this is a top spot and very affordable. Definitely recommend this escape room!

room_title: Escape room "Disorderly Conduct" by Epic Escape Rooms LI in New York
review: Did both rooms at Epic Escape and loved it! Our first visit was perfect and we escaped the Disorderly Conduct room with 45 seconds to spare. We came back for the Killer Feature room with a group of 6 and won with about 14 mins to spare.Rooms are creative, well thought out, and challenging enough to keep you interested as well as constantly using team work and brain power to solve the puzzles.The staff were excellent. E and Kat, spectacular.
